live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 9:30AM. Please stay tuned for updates.
36878.summary: Some customers in the Spence and Colony area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36878.title: Apr 27 – Winnipeg (Spence and Colony) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. We estimate services will be restored by 11:00am.  Please stay tuned for updates.
36879.summary: Some customers in the Palliser Heights area of Moose Jaw are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36879.title: Apr 27 – Moose Jaw (Palliser Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
